modName: Bow of the Unjust - Great for Thieves
summary: Adds a new unique bow to the game for stealthy characters, which contains the best enchantment in the game to date. How do you get it? Well how good are your thieving skills?
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Description[/u][/b]

Adds a new unique bow to the game for stealthy characters, which contains the best enchantment in the game to date. How do you get it? Well how good are your thieving skills? It is guarded by a specifically hired guard in Markarth, who will guard the room with his life. It is also guarded by two Master locks, with no other way of obtaining the weapon. The weapon can be disenchanted to use on another weapon, but beware, the weapon goes through soul gems [b]really[/b] fast!



[b][u]Where to find it[/u][/b]

Go to Markarth, it is locked inside a room on the stairs opposite the blacksmith's, in a safe on the wall. You will need to pick two locks, and avoid the traps.


[b][u]Compatibility Issues[/u][/b]

None yet! :D


[b][u]Known Bugs[/b][/u]

None yet! :D




[i]Find any bugs? Have an ideas? Let me know![/i]
author: Sam Beevors
